between(field, lessValue, greaterValue) → {baqend.Query.Condition}

Adds a between filter to the field. This is a shorthand for an less than and greater than filter.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
field String The field to filter
lessValue Number | String | Date The field value must be greater than this value
greaterValue Number | String | Date The field value must be less than this value

matches(field, regExp) → {baqend.Query.Condition}

Adds a regular expression filter to the field. The field value must matches the regular expression.

Note: Only anchored expressions (Expressions that starts with an ^) and the multiline flag are supported.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
field String The field to filter
regExp String | RegExp The regular expression of the filter
Source:
  • Query.js, line 344
See:
  • http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/regex/
Returns:
The resulting Query

baqend.Query.Condition

Adds a modulo filter to the field. The field value divided by divisor must be equal to the remainder.

near(field, geoPoint, maxDistance) → {baqend.Query.Condition}

Adds a geopoint based near filter to the GeoPoint field. The GeoPoint must be within the maximum distance to the given GeoPoint. Returns from nearest to farthest.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
field String The field to filter
geoPoint baqend.GeoPoint The GeoPoint to filter
maxDistance Number Tha maximum distance to filter
